data.description:
Travelers is a single, universal, social and immersive virtual World that is facilitated by the use of virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR). You can visit World Heritages, famous artifacts and more in 3D space and meet new people.
* Some of the places in Travelers (We are adding new ones, please see in the app).
- Stonehenge, Wiltshire, England
- The Hintze Hall, Natural History Museum, London
- Nazca Lines, Astronaut, Peru
- Bedroom in Arles, Van Gogh
- Ancient theathre of Kiybra, Turkiye
- Hallwyl Museum, Stockholm
- The Picture Gallery of the Hallwyl Museum, Stockholm
- King's Hall Skokloster Castle, Sweden
- Ancient theathre of Sagalassos, Turkiye
- Casa Gassia, Ecomuseu de les Valls d’Àneu, Espanya
- St. Bride's Crypt, London
- St. Dunstan-in-the-West, London
- St. Peter's Church, Stourton
- St Laurence Priory, Snaith, Doncaster DN14 9HE
- Church of Sts Boris and Gleb, Russia
- Nine Dome Mosque, Bagerhat, Bangladesh
- Sanctuary of Bom Jesus do Monte in Braga
- Amphitheatre of Butrint
- Christ Church, Stannington, Sheffield, England
- The church of Santa Maria de Taüll
- The church of Santa Maria de Cardet
- The church of Sant Feliu de Barruera
- The hermitage of Sant Quirc de Durro
- Museo de Arte de Gerona
- Mexico City Metropolitan Cathedral
- Abdurrahman Gazi Mosque and Turbe, Erzurum, Turkiye
- Registan, Samarkand
- Rock Carvings in Tanum
- Tsurugajo Castle, Japan
- Three Cupolas, Erzurum, Turkiye
- The Gūr-i Amīr or Guri Amir, Uzbekistan
- Ayazma Mosque, Uskudar, Istanbul
...
and more
